Flow.description: Flow to allow planners to set up regular recommendations

formulas.name: earliestMonth
lastMonthNum

Flow.label: Recommendation | set up regulars

value.stringValue: Has the destination product been accepted already?

fields.name: First_month_of_contribution
fields.helpText: Leave blank if this should be set up as soon as possible. ISA/GIA regulars are taken on the 18th and SIPP regulars on the 2nd of each month.

fields.name: lastMonth
fields.helpText: Leave blank if this currently has no end date. If you provide a date, a recommendation to cancel this regular will be set up, to be fulfilled just after the last contribution.

value.stringValue: Is there an action that has to happen before this regular can begin?
Does an existing regular need to be cancelled as a result?

fields.name: selectExapl
fields.fieldText: Please select all products below which currently have a regular contribution into them which needs to be cancelled as a result of this new regular being set up.

fields.name: text
fields.fieldText:
This recommendation will be created once you've finished this flow.

You can either create another Regular recommendation, go to this one, or click 'Finish'.

If you click Finish, you'll be taken to the screen that allow you to select the next recommendation type you'd like to create.
